39.eng-name: The Book on the Description of Hellfire
39.ara-name: كتاب صفة جهنم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Al-Hasan said:"While he was on the pulpit – the pulpit of Al-Basrah – `Utbah bin Ghazwain narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said: “Indeed a giant rock can be thrown from the brink of Hell and it will continue to fall into it for seventy years without reaching the bottom of it.”.He said: “`Umar used to say:'Increase in your remembrance of the Fire, for its heat is extreme, its bottom is distant, and its whips are of Iron.'” (Sahih)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صِفَةِ قَعْرِ جَهَنَّمَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About the Description of the Depth of Hell
